statements: SELECT * FROM air_quality_data;
SELECT sensor_name, pollution_level FROM air_quality_data WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_name, pollutant_type FROM air_quality_data WHERE pollutant_type = 'PM 2.5';
SELECT * FROM air_quality_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT location_id, COUNT(sensor_id) AS total_sensors FROM air_quality_data GROUP BY location_id;
SELECT * FROM air_quality_data WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_name, pollutant_type, pollution_level FROM air_quality_data WHERE pollutant_type = 'PM2.5';
SELECT sensor_name, location_id, timestamp FROM air_quality_data WHERE location_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(pollution_level) AS average_pollution_level, pollutant_type FROM air_quality_data GROUP BY pollutant_type;
SELECT * FROM air_quality_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM AirQualityData;
SELECT sensor_id, location, timestamp FROM AirQualityData WHERE pollution_level > 100;
SELECT location, timestamp FROM AirQualityData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, location FROM AirQualityData WHERE sensor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalInitiatives WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM AirQualityData WHERE location = 'London' AND pollution_level > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, location, sensor_id FROM AirQualityData WHERE pollution_level < 30 ORDER BY location ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(pollution_level) AS avg_pollution, location FROM AirQualityData GROUP BY location HAVING avg_pollution > 40 ORDER BY avg_pollution DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalInitiatives WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY initiative_name ASC;
SELECT MAX(pollution_level) AS max_pollution, MIN(pollution_level) AS min_pollution, location FROM AirQualityData GROUP BY location HAVING max_pollution - min_pollution > 20 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM air_quality_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT pollutant_type, concentration FROM air_quality_data WHERE concentration > 50;
SELECT source_name, location FROM pollution_sources WHERE primary_pollutant_type = 'PM2.5';
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM environmental_initiatives WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY initiative_name ASC;
SELECT source_id, source_name, primary_pollutant_type FROM pollution_sources WHERE location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT * FROM air_quality_data WHERE concentration > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT source_name, location, primary_pollutant_type FROM pollution_sources WHERE location = 'City Center';
SELECT MAX(concentration), MIN(concentration), AVG(concentration) FROM air_quality_data WHERE pollutant_type = 'PM2.5';
SELECT source_name, COUNT(*) as total_records FROM pollution_sources GROUP BY source_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM environmental_initiatives WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM air_quality_data;
SELECT location, pollutant_type, pollution_level FROM air_quality_data WHERE pollution_level > 50;
SELECT device_name, installation_date FROM sensor_devices ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT source_name, city, emission_rate FROM pollution_sources WHERE emission_rate < 100 ORDER BY emission_rate;
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM environmental_initiatives WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM air_quality_data WHERE pollution_level > 50;
SELECT location, pollutant_type, pollution_level FROM air_quality_data WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY pollution_level DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) AS total_readings FROM air_quality_data GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM sensor_devices WHERE installation_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT source_name, city, emission_rate FROM pollution_sources WHERE emission_rate BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY emission_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM AirQualityData ORDER BY measurement_datetime DESC;
SELECT city_name, pollutant_type, pollutant_level FROM AirQualityData WHERE pollutant_level > 100;
SELECT city_name, city_id, population FROM Cities WHERE region = 'North';
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM EnvironmentalInitiatives WHERE end_date > '2022-10-01';
SELECT city_name, alert_level, alert_datetime FROM PollutionAlerts ORDER BY alert_datetime ASC;
SELECT * FROM AirQualityData WHERE city_name = 'New York' ORDER BY measurement_datetime DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT city_name, pollutant_type, pollutant_level FROM AirQualityData WHERE pollutant_type LIKE 'NO%' ORDER BY pollutant_level DESC;
SELECT city_name, sensor_type FROM Sensors WHERE location = 'Central Park' AND sensor_type IN ('PM 2.5', 'Ozone') ORDER BY sensor_type ASC;
SELECT city_name, population FROM Cities WHERE region = 'West Coast' AND population > 1000000 ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT initiative_name, description, start_date, end_date FROM EnvironmentalInitiatives WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2024-01-01';
